name: MoneeMint
slogan: The Freshest Banking Experience Since…. Now!
description: Fresh like the flavour of mint, an experience that reimagines how you think about banking. A bank built for your smartphone architected around your lifestyle. Built on the foundations of socially responsible banking and cutting-edge technology, we bring to you, digital financial services that are intelligent, unique, and most important, Refreshingly delightful.

team.name: Rizwan S Qazi
team.bioHtml: Experienced international executive with 19 years of experience in consumer finance and banking industry. Turnaround specialist, startup, payments, loyalty.

jobs.title: Chief Financial Officer
jobs.description:
About MoneeMint:

We are creating a banking experience like never before.

Fresh like the flavour of mint, an experience that reimagines how you think about banking. A bank built for your smartphone architected around your lifestyle. Built on the foundations of socially responsible banking and cutting-edge technology, we bring to you, digital financial services that are intelligent, unique, and most important, Refreshingly delightful.

About The Role:

When an early-stage company's resources are relatively limited, the Chief Financial Officer (CFO) is critical for fundraising, cash-flow management, financial accounting, projections, and risk management. MoneeMint is looking for an experienced but entrepreneurial finance professional who wants to contribute more than debits and credits, but will think strategically about future-proofing our business.

General Responsibilities:

Advise CEO on fundraising plans and capital structure
Manage and regularly report cash flow to the Senior Management Team
Drive the company’s financial planning
Prepare reliable current and forecasting reports
Put into place strong financial controls
Manage any internal or external finance/audit professionals
Requirements:

Proven experience as CFO, Director of Finance, or Finance Manager, ideally in a startup environment
In depth knowledge of startup financial law and risk management practices
Excellent knowledge of data analysis and forecasting methods
Proficient in the use of Excel and financial management software (e.g. Xero)
Ability to strategize and solve problems
Strong leadership and organizational skills
Excellent communication and people skills
An analytical mind, comfortable with numbers
CPA is a strong advantage
BSc/BA in Accounting, Finance or relevant field; MSc/MBA is a plus
Benefits:

Working at MoneeMint is not like most other companies - and certainly not like other finance companies! We have a range of perks which make us different, and some of these include:

Stock options in the company
A relaxed open-plan working environment
Regular team-building afternoons (recently we've done a pizza-making afternoon, had a ping-pong tournament - and next up is graffiti lessons!)
Real potential for career advancement in a fast-moving, entrepreneurial organisation. Think of this as a real-life MBA if you don't already have one!

jobs.title: Chief Operating Officer
jobs.description:
We are creating a banking experience like never before.

Fresh like the flavour of mint, an experience that reimagines how you think about banking. A bank built for your smartphone architected around your lifestyle. Built on the foundations of socially responsible banking and cutting-edge technology, we bring to you, digital financial services that are intelligent, unique, and most important, Refreshingly delightful.

Our Chief Operating Officer will be an active member of our Senior Management Team and responsible for the efficient operation of the business.

The Chief Operating Officer will be expected to have a good working knowledge of what the different divisions in the business are working on, and to be the bridge between the various groups to ensure that we are all aligned on the priorities for the business and that there is cohesion across the different groups.

As a FinTech business, we have a wide range of business groups, and the Chief Operating Officer will be expected to grasp the details, challenges, and objectives of the different parts of the business. We will expect the Chief Operating Officer to be able to get their hands dirty with the details as required, but also to be able to provide a comprehensive overview for the rest of the Senior Management Team as to the workings between the groups so that better decisions can be made at the Senior Management level.

The Chief Operating Officer will be responsible for the day-to-day operations of the business.

Requirements
In addition to the role of coordinating the groups within the business, the Chief Operating Officer will have direct responsibility for a number of teams within the business, including the following:
•	Human Resources
•	Marketing
•	Customer Operations
•	Service/Project Management
•	IT Operations/WorkTech
•	Business Intelligence
•	and any other teams as required by the business

These teams will report directly to the Chief Operating Officer.

The Chief Operating Officer will be part of the Senior Management Team (SMT) within the business; and will report directly to the Founders.
In his/her role as Chief Operating Officer, you will be expected to gain a deep understanding of the vision for the business, and the near-term and long-term goals for the business to successfully execute this vision.

Benefits:
Working at MoneeMint is not like most other companies - and certainly not like other finance companies! We have a range of perks which make us different, and some of these include:
•	All staff have the opportunity to be granted stock options in the company;
•	A relaxed open-plan working environment;
•	Regular team-building afternoons (recently we've done a pizza-making afternoon, had a ping-pong tournament - and next up is graffiti lessons!);

and, of course:
Real potential for career advancement in a fast moving market leading organisation.

jobs.title: Chief Technical Officer
jobs.description:
About MoneeMint:

We are creating a banking experience like never before.

Fresh like the flavour of mint, an experience that reimagines how you think about banking. A bank built for your smartphone architected around your lifestyle. Built on the foundations of socially responsible banking and cutting-edge technology, we bring to you, digital financial services that are intelligent, unique, and most important, Refreshingly delightful.

About the Role:

We are looking for a co-founding CTO who is both excellent at coding, especially in the short term, and can manage a team of coders as we grow and scale. You will be responsible for developing and implementing the technology side of MoneeMint's mobile platform as we grow. Enterprise level robustness in design, thinking and coding is essential.

Essential Skills:

Experienced, full-stack developer
Capable of building middleware and APIs from scratch
Comfortable developing responsive front end UI
Expertise in Java and PHP
Knowledge of HTML5, CSS3/JS, AngularJS, REST a plus
A self-starter who enjoys solving technical challenges with novel solutions
Capable of managing relationships with external platforms
Desirable Skills:

Experience developing finance related apps
Comfortable developing Android, iOS applications with scale in mind
Experience working in a start-up
Relevant qualifications
Experience working in Finance industry
Cultural Fit

You don't follow the rules. You have worked in big business, but are interested in the small details that make all the difference.
You are looking for growth and a greater sense of ownership of your work.
You are passionate about the look and feel of the product, but you believe in robust, secure and scaleable solutions to big challenges.
You think big, act swiftly and are excited to roll your sleeves up.
You are probably a bit of an odd character who isn't "conventional
If this sounds remotely like you, you should get in touch!

Benefits:

Working at MoneeMint is not like most other companies - and certainly not like other finance companies! We have a range of perks which make us different, and some of these include:

Stock options in the company
A relaxed open-plan working environment
Regular team-building afternoons (recently we've done a pizza-making afternoon, had a ping-pong tournament - and next up is graffiti lessons!)
Real potential for career advancement in a fast-moving, entrepreneurial organisation.

jobs.title: Marketing Manager
jobs.description:
### About MoneeMint:
We are creating a banking experience like never before.

Fresh like the flavour of mint, an experience that reimagines how you think about banking. A bank built for your smartphone architected around your lifestyle. Built on the foundations of socially responsible banking and cutting-edge technology, we bring to you, digital financial services that are intelligent, unique, and most important, Refreshingly delightful.

### About the Role:
### 
We are looking for someone who is passionate about creating and building awareness of consumer-friendly financial services. This is a once-in-a-lifetime opportunity to create market demand for Europe's first ethical Neo-bank.

### General Responsibilities:
### 
* Develop strategies and tactics to get the word out about our company and drive qualified traffic to our front door
* Deploy successful marketing campaigns and own their implementation from ideation to execution
* Experiment with a variety of organic and paid acquisition channels like content creation, content curation, pay per click campaigns, event management, publicity, social media, lead generation campaigns, copywriting, performance analysis
* Produce valuable and engaging content for our website and blog that attracts and converts our target groups
* Build strategic relationships and partner with key industry players, agencies and vendors
* Prepare and monitor the marketing budget on a quarterly and annual basis and allocate funds wisely
* Oversee and approve marketing material, from website banners to hard copy brochures and case studies
* Measure and report on the performance of marketing campaigns, gain insight and assess against goals
Analyze consumer behavior and adjust email and advertising campaigns accordingly

### Requirements:

* Demonstrable experience in marketing together with the potential and attitude required to learn
* Proven experience in identifying target audiences and in creatively devising and leading across channels marketing campaigns that engage, educate and motivate
* Solid knowledge of website analytics tools (e.g., Google Analytics, NetInsight, Omniture, WebTrends)
* Experience in setting up and optimizing Google Adwords campaigns
* Numerically literate, comfortable working with numbers, making sense of metrics and processing figures with spreadsheets
* A sense of aesthetics and a love for great copy and witty communication
* Up-to-date with the latest trends and best practices in online marketing and measurement
* BSc/MSc degree in Marketing or related field

### Benefits:

Working at MoneeMint is not like most other companies - and certainly not like other finance companies! We have a range of perks which make us different, and some of these include:

* Stock options in the company
* A relaxed open-plan working environment
* Regular team-building afternoons (recently we've done a pizza-making afternoon, had a ping-pong tournament - and next up is graffiti lessons!)
* Real potential for career advancement in a fast-moving, entrepreneurial organisation. 
* Think of this as a real-life MBA if you don't already have one!
